text: Momu obi nso a ontumi nware agyidiefoͻ mmaa a wͻ’de wͻn ho no, (ͻnware) monfenaa agyidiefoͻ a wͻ’yε modea no (mu bi). Onyankopͻn Nim sεdeε mogyedie siteε. Mofiri moho-moho mu. Enti monware wͻn wͻ wͻn Wura nom akwamma mu, na monfa wͻn tiri aseda ma wͻn wͻ kwan pa so wͻ awadeε mu; wͻnyε mmaa a wͻ’di wͻn ho nni na wͻ’nnyε adwamanfoͻ, anaa wͻ’nntwe mpena. Nasε wͻ’ware na wͻ’kͻbu bra bͻne bi a, yεnfa ͻbaa a ͻde ne ho asotwee no mu fa ntwe wͻn aso. Saa (mfenaa awadeε nkyerεkyerεmu yi) gyina hͻ ma momu obia osuro sε ͻbεkͻ akͻtͻ bͻne mu.
